(2008) }} }} 《'''split tears'''》是[[fripSide]]的第五张专辑。 == 简介 == *[[fripSide]]的第五张专辑。也是fripSide（一期）的最后一张专辑。 *这张专辑的主要流通盘是fripSide第一张商品番号不以“SCFS”为前缀的主流出道专辑。 *两种版本的内容相同，软件流通盘仅在日本发售，而主要流通盘可以从YesAsia与CDJapan之类的网站上购买。其中只有主要流通盘计入Oricon榜的销量。 == 专辑 == {{BilibiliVideo|id=8949096|page=56}} == 宣传 == {{BilibiliVideo|id=5289884}} {{BilibiliVideo|id=15480093}} == 收录曲目 == {{tracklist | longnote_column = yes | title1 = '''[[before dawn daybreak]]''' | longnote1 = PC游戏《Before Dawn Daybreak ～深渊的歌姬～》主题曲 | length1 = 4:11 | title2 = '''[[split tears(歌曲)|split tears]]''' | longnote2 = PC游戏《片恋之月》插曲 | length2 = 6:14 | title3 = '''praying over (album version)''' | longnote3 = | length3 = 6:14 | title4 = '''[[magicaride]]''' | longnote4 = PC游戏《[[魔女骑士]]》主题曲 | length4 = 4:26 | title5 = '''fictional moon (album version)''' | longnote5 = | length5 = 4:49 | title6 = '''[[snow blind|snow blind (album version)]]''' | longnote6 = | length6 = 5:45 | title7 = '''snow blind -after-''' | longnote7 = | length7 = 5:35 | title8 = '''spiral of despair''' | longnote8 = PC游戏《痴汉专用车辆》主题曲 | length8 = 4:10 | title9 = '''[[escape(reset)|escape -version2008-]]''' | longnote9 = 翻唱reset歌曲 | length9 = 5:14 | title10 = '''tomorrow''' | longnote10 = PC游戏《片恋之月》ED | length10 = 5:13 | title11 = '''eternal twinkle''' | longnote11 = PC游戏《[[闪耀十字军]]》ED | length11 = 5:04 }} {{fripSide}} == 注释 == [[分类:elseena-music音乐专辑‎]] [[分类:Pony Canyon音乐专辑‎]] [[分类:2008年音乐专辑‎]] [[分类:录音室专辑‎]]
